# ðŸ“¤ Sub-Issue: Data Export & Reporting

## Goal
Enable users to export dashboard analytics in CSV, PDF, Excel, and JSON formats, generate custom reports, schedule email digests, and share reports securely.

## Tasks
- [ ] Implement backend export/reporting services for all formats
- [ ] Build frontend UI for report generation, download, and sharing
- [ ] Add scheduled report emails and shareable links
- [ ] Integrate export security (watermark, expiration, password protection)
- [ ] Write tests for export accuracy and scheduled delivery

## Acceptance Criteria
- Users can generate, download, and share reports as described in [parent issue](./dashboard-analytics-core.md)
- Scheduled reports and export security features work
- All report types and formats are supported
